import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Nav() { const [theme, setTheme] = useState(localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light'); // State for current theme const [dropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = useState(false); // State for controlling dropdown visibility useEffect(() => { // Set initial theme based on localStorage or default to light document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme); }, [theme]); const toggleTheme = () => { const newTheme = theme === 'light' ? 'synthwave' : 'light'; // Toggle theme setTheme(newTheme); // Update state localStorage.setItem('theme', newTheme); // Save theme in localStorage }; return (
{/* Dropdown Menu for mobile */}
setDropdownOpen(!dropdownOpen)} // Toggle dropdown open state >

); } export default Nav;
